channel.title: Features on Taiga Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Taiga Resources

item.title: Quick intro to Scrum module
item.description: Scrum is an agile framework for developing, delivering, and sustaining complex products.

item.title: Your crash course into Issues Module
item.description: If you’re after a multipurpose and flexible to-do list Taiga module, check Issues.

item.title: Customisation
item.description: Page for Customisation Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Emphasis Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores.

item.title: Kanban, the dark side
item.description: This is content that goes a bit beyond Taiga as an Agile platform and tries to convey a self-conscious approach to Kanban.

item.title: Scrum, the dark side
item.description: This is content that goes a bit beyond Taiga as an Agile platform and tries to convey a self-conscious approach to Scrum.

item.title: The 5-min Kanban module overview
item.description: Welcome to a lean method to manage and improve work across human systems, welcome to Kanban.
